post.body: Boy George puts the creepy in....creepy
Boy George is a creepy m-f'er :P
*snuggles*
drank the kool-aid for what?
oh i totally do...but this is really only a half week, got like 4 days off still thank you christmas.
that would be like kidnapping and imprisonment against my will or something...I would soooo get the divorce granted easy
ewwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww I prefer my marshmallows non-burnt and non-melty :P
poor Sebby, life is tough *hugs*
let's throw a water party
you mean the igloos and what not :D and hey like the rose hehe
http://twitpic.com/u11p - Yeah she's looking like 'i know where you sleep rose. I could smother you' Badass mafia cat
trying to write kim a birthday fic....shhhh everyone cuz i'm lacking focus
Drinking the Twiltter Kool-Aid. You girls suck hardcore but I love you anyway
Tell me Indy isn't the seventh circle of hell. 2 days after xmas and its 70degrees. I am hot.....WTF?!
Happy Christmas and a Merry New Year....that's right, I said it backwards. Deal. Hope everyone is having a wonderful time with family.
Doesn't feel quite like christmas this year
off work again today :D
first day back at work after vacation...good but still the suck. Vacations should last forever!
Back to work tomorrow and I was just getting used to this staying at home and being a bum thing.
Finished up christmas shopping. No christmas eve shopping for me!
everytime i hear it, I love Jeff Buckley's version of Hallelujah more and more
Yay for not getting the amount of ice we were supposed to get!
actually finished a bday fic. way to go me
I hate online translators for not being freakin' helpful
